# useMorfix

> Hook

## Import

```js copy
import { useMorfix } from 'morfix';
```


## Parameters
| Name | Type | Default | Description |
| ---- | ---- | ------- | ----------- |
| initialValues* | Values | Required | 
| onSubmit | SubmitAction&lt;Values&gt; |  | 
| validateForm | FieldValidator&lt;Values&gt; |  |
